bug.author: opencv-pushbot
bug.description:
Transferred from <denchmark-link:http://code.opencv.org/issues/2982>http://code.opencv.org/issues/2982</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>|| Lucas Teixeira on 2013-04-23 21:02 || Priority: Normal || Affected: 2.4.5 (latest release) || Category: samples || Tracker: Bug || Difficulty: None || PR: || Platform: None / None </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>Sample OpenGL_Qt_Binding</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>The sample OpenGL_Qt_Binding (/sample/cpp/Qt_sample) doesn't work. Actually, it looks like incomplete.
the flag CV_WINDOW_OPENGL is missing and many other issues. It compiles, but doesn't work. </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>History</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h5>Anna Kogan on 2013-05-07 09:21</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Hello Lucas, Thank you for reporting the issue. If you could fix the issue on your side, a "pull request":http://www.code.opencv.org/projects/opencv/wiki/How_to_contribute in our GitHub repo would be highly appreciated! </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: I think this is an outdated issue and can be closed down
